data.message: My timeline is never refreshed, I see statuses from Tuesday & Wednesday but today is Sunday...smh

replies.message: Hey Charisma. Sorry you're experiencing issues with your News Feed. This sounds like a bug. Can you please help us track these issues and submit the problem to support through our Help Center? http://on.fb.me/1tEHZYO  - Elissa

I have done that!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! THAT is my point,, NO ONE has bothered to reply to me!!! or fix the problem,, I included the link to the group and everything i Knew to do,, Bottom line, BETTER customer service
